## Import library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Import data
```{r}
trawlog <- read.csv("marissa-skate/data_raw/ebs2017_2018.csv")
```
```{r}
trawl <- 
  trawl_og %>%
  separate('GENUS_SPECIES', c('Genus','species'),'_', extra='drop') %>%
  group_by(Genus) %>%
  summarize(count=n())
```
